   Gift Ideas That Will Make Mom Smile
 
Mother's Day offers a chance to show the moms in your life that you appreciate what they do all year long. This year, show Mom that you think she's still cool by giving a gift that has some staying power. Sure, candies and flowers are nice, but they don't last, and they don't have the "wow" factor of electronics. Consumer Guide and HowStuffWorks have pulled together some of the year's coolest gifts for moms. Whether she's tech-savvy or a technophobe, you're sure to find a great gadget for her in this gift guide.

How Lithium-ion Batteries Work -You can find them in laptops, PDAs, cell phones and iPods --
and also in the news when there's a battery recall. Find out why lithium-ion
batteries are so popular these days and why there's a small chance they could
burst into flame.
 

How Blogs Work - Blogs serve as online journals and communities, often linking
to news stories and other sites. Learn the basics of blogging, explore the
blogosphere and find out how to create your own blog and publish it to the
world.
   
This Week's Video 
Did you know the PlayStation 3 video game console does a lot
more than play games? By attaching a keyboard and mouse, you can surf the
Internet on your TV screen. Learn how to browse Web sites and watch online
videos with the PS3 in this video from HowStuffWorks.
